mapper.select: SELECT M.memb_nm, m.memb_id, SUM(CASE WHEN buss_st = '0K4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "K4", SUM(CASE WHEN buss_st = '0K2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "K2", SUM(CASE WHEN buss_st = '0K3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "K3" FROM project_member pm LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (pm.memb_id = M.memb_id) LEFT JOIN (SELECT bm.memb_id, b.buss_st, bm.buss_no FROM business B JOIN business_member bm ON (B.buss_no = bm.buss_no) WHERE b.prjt_no = 1) bl ON pm.memb_id = bl.memb_id WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo} GROUP BY memb_nm, m.memb_id
